name: Toll The Dead
description:
Entry for AardJam#2

Toll The Dead - Karl is kinda tired of undeads storming his church every night. After this sunset nothing changes and only morning bell can bring some fresh air...

Controls:  Move: WASD or arrows; Shovel: LMB; Gun: RMB; Dash: Space

Every day you can choose one blessing out of two. Melee kills drop ammo. You die in one hit, just like skeletons

Source code on Github

Huge thanks to Kenney for beautiful free assets

Comment and I will check your game too:)
